Factsheet

Developer:
Vhalenn
Based in Paris, France
Release date:
When it is ready
Platforms:
PC / Mac
Website:
vhalenn.itch.io/mindventure
Regular Price:

Description

MindVenture let you create wonderful living worlds and share them easily. Create lands with trees, animals, people, villages. Explore other worlds created and make awesome discoveries.

History

MindVenture is a solo project where I try to push creativity to create an editor easy to use by everyone, to create worlds.

Features

  • World Editor
  • Maps created by the community
  • Unique biomes and creatures
  • Many playable characters
